job_title: Systems Integration Engineer II, Platform Integration, Autonomy
job_description:
• Review and analyze large datasets from vehicle logs utilizing platforms like Databricks and Hexto correlate vehicle performance with requirements and develop insightful Key PerformanceIndicators (KPIs), particularly for system health and fault reporting.
• Lead efforts to improve ADAS system health monitoring, including supporting systems team ondefining factory/service facing requirements, configuring data triggers, and designingdashboards to measure and report faults.
• Deep-dive into vehicle log data and source code if required to root-cause system-level issuesand facilitate rapid issue resolution in collaboration with domain experts.
• Lead efforts to improve ADAS system health monitoring, including defining requirements,configuring data triggers, and designing dashboards to measure and report faults.
• Experience working with large-scale, cloud-based vehicle data, including familiarity with logformats and data warehousing platforms (e.
• Experience with Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) or bench testing, including spoofing vehicle signals(e.
• Direct, hands-on experience with automotive ECUs, diagnostic protocols (UDS, CAN, Ethernet),and diagnostic tools for debugging and data extraction.
• Hands-on experience debugging complex systems that involve multiple ECUs with interfaces tovarious vehicle sub-systems.
